{"id":924496414,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"3 months, 3 weeks","timestamp":1680129959,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"0 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/924496414/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Happy Number","memory":"6.1 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    bool isHappy(int n) {\n        unordered_map<int,int> hashTable;\n        int tmp = 0 , res = 0;\n        while(n > 1)\n        {\n            tmp = n;\n            while(tmp > 0)\n            {\n                res += pow(tmp%10 , 2);\n                tmp /= 10;\n            }\n            hashTable[res] ++;\n            if(hashTable[res] > 1)\n            {\n                return false;\n            }\n            n = res;\n            res = 0;\n        }\n        return true;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"happy-number","has_notes":false}
